item.description:
How about another weekend walk? Generally we end up grouping up by pace, but overall the group has been walking at nice brisk pace, keeping us warm in the cool air.

Meet for a Sunday Morning Walk @ Pond Meadow Park! We will be meeting on the Braintree side of PMP by the flagpole near the Ranger Station.

We will walk around the loop twice which totals 3.5 miles all together & takes about 1 hr 5 mins - 1 hr 15 mins.
We will wait about 5 minutes for late arrivals, but please try to be on time.

Sunday, November 28th @ 11:30am
Pond Meadow Park
470 Liberty Street
Braintree, MA 02184
No phone #.
www.pondmeadowpark.org

..

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Late Morning Walk
